pages.text: Machine blocks can be right-clicked with various materials to obtain different Rider items. These blocks play a key part in obtaining certain items used to craft transformation devices and/or access forms.

pages.title: Gashapon Machine
pages.text: Use emeralds on this block to obtain $(l:misc/items/gashapon_capsules)Gashapon Capsules$(/l)
Found in various $(l:misc/city/suburban_area)City bui$(/l)$(l:misc/city/urban_area)ldings$(/l)$(br2)Traded by a $(l:misc/villagers#wandering_trader)Wandering Trader$(/l)

pages.title: Amazon Cell Extractor
pages.text: Use $(l:misc/items/empty_vial)Empty Vials$(/l) on this block to obtain $(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vials$(/l)

pages.title: Amazon Cell Mutator
pages.text: Use $(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vials$(/l) on this block to obtain Amazon Cell variants$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vials#omega_amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vial (Omega)$(/l) (38.5%)$(li)$(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vials#alpha_amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vial (Alpha)$(/l) (38.5%)$(li)$(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vials#sigma_amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vial (Sigma)$(/l) (15.4%)$(li)$(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vials#neo_amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vial (Neo)$(/l) (7.7%)

pages.title: Kaijin Stone Generator
pages.text: Use $(l:black_sun/items/creation_king_extract_vial)Creation King Extract Vials$(/l) on this block to obtain Kaijin Stones$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:black_sun/items/kaijin_stone)Kaijin Stone$(/l) (54.1%)$(li)$(l:black_sun/items/kingstones#king_stone_sun)Sun Kingstone$(/l) (27%)$(li)$(l:black_sun/items/kingstones#glowing_king_stone_sun)Glowing Sun Kingstone$(/l) (2.7%)$(li)$(l:black_sun/items/kingstones#king_stone_moon)Moon Kingstone$(/l) (13.5%)$(li)$(l:black_sun/items/kingstones#glowing_king_stone_moon)Glowing Moon Kingstone$(/l) (2.7%)

pages.title: G-Chip Programmer
pages.text: Use $(l:agito/items/g3core)Blank G-System Chips$(/l) on this block to obtain G-Chips$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3)G3 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3x)G3-X Chip$(/l) (8.3%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3mild)G3 Mild Chip$(/l) (5.6%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g4)G4 Chip$(/l) (2.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g1)G1 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#v1)V1 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)

pages.title: Fuestle Replicator
pages.text: Used to convert $(l:kiva/items/fuestle)Fuestles$(/l) into $(l:kiva/items/fuestlefake)Fake Fuestles$(/l) and then into $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#fakegarulufuestle)Ixa's Fake Fuestles$(/l)

pages.title: Gaia Memory Refiner
pages.text: Use $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_s)unrefined$(/l) $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_g)Memories$(/l) on this block to obtain Gaia Memories$(br2)Drops with an $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_s)Unrefined Memory (Silver)$(/l):$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#cyclone_memory)Cyclone Memory$(/l) (31.7%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#heat_memory)Heat Memory$(/l) (15.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#luna_memory)Luna Memory$(/l) (15.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#skull_memory)Skull Memory$(/l) (7.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#eternal_memory)Eternal Memory$(/l) (7.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#prism_memory)Prism Memory$(/l) (7.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#engine_memory)Engine Memory$(/l) (7.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#bomb_memory)Bomb Memory$(/l) (1.6%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#fang_memory_un)Unfinished Fang Memory$(/l) (7.9%)$(li)$(l:w/items/gaia_memories#xtreme_memory_s)Xtreme Memory (Silver)$(/l) (1.6%)

pages.title: Cell Medal Programmer
pages.text: Use $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)normal Cell Medals$(/l) on this block to obtain Birth's Cell Medals$(br2)Drops with a $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medal$(/l):$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_eyes)Birth Core (Powered)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_breast_cannon)Birth Cell Medal (Breast Cannon)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_crane_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Crane Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_drill_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Drill Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_shovel_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Shovel Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_catepillar_leg)Birth Cell Medal (Caterpillar Leg)$(/l) (14.3%)

$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_cutter_wing)Birth Cell Medal (Cutter Wing)$(/l) (14.3%)$(br2)Drops with packed ice:$(li)$(l:ooo/items/core_medals#seiuchi_medal)Seiuchi Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/core_medals#shirokuma_medal)Shirokuma Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/core_medals#penguin_medal)Penguin Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)

pages.title: Shift Chassis Assembler
pages.text: Use $(l:drive/items/drive_system_cars)cars$(/l) and $(l:drive/items/next_system_bikes)bikes$(/l) from the Drive System on this block to obtain Shift Cars and Signal Bikes$(br2)Drops with a $(l:drive/items/drive_system_car)Drive System Car$(/l):$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#speedshift)Shift Speed$(/l) (11.6%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#wildshift)Shift Wild$(/l) (4.7%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#technicshift)Shift Technic$(/l) (3.9%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#deadheat_car)Shift Dead Heat Car$(/l) (2.3%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#tridoronshift_core)Unfinished Shift Tridoron$(/l) (3.9%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#maxflare)Max Flare$(/l) (5.4%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#funkyspike)Funky Spike$(/l) (5.4%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#midnightshadow)Midnight Shadow$(/l) (5.4%)
